references: Related: Cf 134129, CF 166692. Amending: Ord 45382. Repealing: Ord 68100
summary: An ordinance relating to the height of buildings and other structures in the vicinity of Boeing Field, and amending Part III, Height Districts, Sections 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 and 16, of Ordinance No. 45382 (the Zoning Ordinance), as amended, and repealing Ordinance No. 68100.
